Hematologic Malignancy Program At the Providence Hematologic Malignancies Program, we provide compassionate care for cancers of the blood, bone marrow and lymph nodes. We combine the most advanced therapies with new research to use your body's own immune system to fight cancer. Meet the Team At Providence, you'll have access to a vast network of dedicated and compassionate providers who offer personalized care by focusing on treatment, prevention and health education. Our team of physicians are experts in hematologic malignancies including Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemia, myeloma, and the myelodysplastic syndromes. We use a team approach to care because we know you'll benefit most when you have the knowledge of many different specialists guiding your treatment. - Breakthrough research and [clinical trials](https://research.providence.org/clinical-trials-list/?page=1&clinicalProgram=cancer&location=OR&condition=Hematologic)through the [Earle A. Chiles Research Institute](/locations/or/earle-a-chiles-research-institute) - Expert care from our and specialists, oncology nurses, radiation oncologists, pathologists, genetic-risk experts, oncology social workers, integrative medicine providers, nutrition specialists, clinical trials nurses, medical assistants and others [Cellular therapies](/locations/or/cancer-institute/personalized-cancer-care/cellular-therapies)that use your immune system to fight cancer with both FDA-approved treatments and clinical trials - [Autologous Stem Cell Transplant Program](/locations/or/cancer-institute/personalized-cancer-care/autologous-stem-cell-transplant-program)offers treatment for a broad range of diseases [Compassionate support](/locations/or/cancer-institute/supporting-our-patients)through every step of your care and follow-up The Hematologic Malignancy Program at Providence Cancer Institute cares for people with various types of cancer and blood disorders, including: - Acute Leukemias - Chronic Leukemias - Hodgkin Lymphoma - Multiple Myeloma - Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma - Non-cancerous blood disorders Why Choose Us for Your Cancer Care? Part of Providence Cancer Institute of Oregon Providence Cancer Institute is a leading provider of cancer care in Oregon, and part of the largest community-based cancer-care network in the United States. Regardless of where you go for care, you have an entire team of cancer experts working together to provide a personalized, whole-person approach to your care.
